DOC.brief_title: Crossover Study With ProSeal Supreme Laryngeal Mask Airway
DOC.detailed_description: The LMA Supreme new extraglottic airway device bring together feature LMA ProSeal ( high seal cuff , gastric access bite block - facilitate ventilation , airway protection airway obstruction , respectively ) , LMA Fastrach ( fix cuve tube guide handle - facilitate insertion fixation ) LMA Unique ( single use - prevention disease transmission ) . The new feature airway tube incorporates drain tube within lumen shorten straighten path , oval-shaped match shape mouth reduce rotation pharynx , inner cuff strengthen prevent airway obstruction infolding epiglottic fin add prevent airway obstruction epiglottic downfolding . In follow randomize , crossover study , test hypothesis ease insertion , oropharyngeal leak pressure , fiberoptic position ease gastric tube placement differ LMA ProSeal LMA Supreme paralyze , anesthetize patient
DOC.criteria: American Society Anesthesiology physical status grade III Age 1880 yr Elective gynecological surgery Supine position Known predict difficult airway Body mass index > 35 kg m2 Risk aspiration
